repo_description: GraphQL-based API server to encapsulate all kinds of REST APIs.

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/zhicwu/api-hub/blob/21f256ab55f86193d90c5b172cde92e27c9c27a5/schema/root.graphql:
type Query {
  jobs: [PentahoJob]
}
# https://github.com/zhicwu/api-hub/blob/21f256ab55f86193d90c5b172cde92e27c9c27a5/schema/pentaho.graphql:
# A type that describes a scheduled job on Pentaho BI server(now Pentaho Server)
type PentahoJob {
    # group name
    group: String!,
    # job id
    id: String!,
    # job name
    name: String!,
    # last run
    lastRun: String,
    # next run
    nextRun: String,
    # job state
    state: String!,
    # user name
    user: String!,
    server: String!,
    duration: Int!,
    parameters: [PentahoJobParameter]!,
    trigger: PentahoJobTrigger
}

type PentahoJobParameter {
    name: String!,
    value: String
}

type PentahoJobTrigger {
    type: String!,
    startTime: String
}

schemas.name: pentaho.graphql
schemas.content:
# A type that describes a scheduled job on Pentaho BI server(now Pentaho Server)
type PentahoJob {
    # group name
    group: String!,
    # job id
    id: String!,
    # job name
    name: String!,
    # last run
    lastRun: String,
    # next run
    nextRun: String,
    # job state
    state: String!,
    # user name
    user: String!,
    server: String!,
    duration: Int!,
    parameters: [PentahoJobParameter]!,
    trigger: PentahoJobTrigger
}

type PentahoJobParameter {
    name: String!,
    value: String
}

type PentahoJobTrigger {
    type: String!,
    startTime: String
}
